tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InvasiveSpecies (
    ID INT PRIMARY KEY,
    Name VARCHAR(255),
    SpeciesType VARCHAR(100),
    Origin VARCHAR(100),
    ImpactOnEcosystem TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SpeciesEcosystem (
  species_id INT,
  ecosystem_id INT,
  population INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_species FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES InvasiveSpecies(species_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_ecosystem FOREIGN KEY (ecosystem_id) REFERENCES Ecosystems(ecosystem_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sightings (
   sighting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   species_id INT,
   ecosystem_id INT,
   sighting_date DATE,
   FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES invasive_species(species_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (ecosystem_id) REFERENCES ecosystems(ecosystem_id)
);
